Posts.Title: New Here and worried ibot ibot

Posts.Content: ibot wrote: Hello all. I'm new here and need to talk to people who know something about all this.Long story short, cystic forever, mammos on time. 9/08 mammo showed microcalcs, birad3. 3/09 mammo report says heterogeneneously dense, CAD eval,grouped small punctate calcs in upper quadrant in anterior one third. Scattered b9 appearing calcs. Grouped punctate calcs at 6 o'clock posterior depth. These are increased in number with intermediate suspicion . Biopsy recommended. Birad 4b.Â  I have appointment 4/15 with surgeon for consultation. All GP said was 'It's not good. Get the Biopsy", Big help there. Please would someone explain positions etc. I have read everything I can and still lost. Trying not to fret but very hard. the wait is awfull. Thankx to all. Dx 4/27/2009, DCIS, <1cm, Stage 0, Grade 3, 0/5 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
